org.knime.core.node.port.database.pivoting

Interface PivotStatementGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CasePivotStatementGenerator, DefaultPivotStatementGenerator

    public interface PivotStatementGenerator
    This interface must be implemented by all classes creating SQL Statements for pivoting.
    Since:
    3.1
    Author:
    Lara Gorini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getPivotStatement(StatementManipulator sm, String tableName, List<String> groupByColumnsList, Map<DataColumnSpec,Set<Object>> pivotElements, List<Pair<String,DBAggregationFunction>> aggValues, PivotColumnNameGenerator pivotColGenerator)
      Returns a SQL Statement for pivoting.

    • Method Detail

      • getPivotStatement

        String getPivotStatement(StatementManipulator sm,
                         String tableName,
                         List<String> groupByColumnsList,
                         Map<DataColumnSpec,Set<Object>> pivotElements,
                         List<Pair<String,DBAggregationFunction>> aggValues,
                         PivotColumnNameGenerator pivotColGenerator)
        Returns a SQL Statement for pivoting.
        Parameters:
        sm - Statement Manipulator to use
        tableName - Input query
        groupByColumnsList - Name of columns used for GROUP BY
        pivotElements - Columns and corresponding elements used for pivot
        aggValues - Aggregation columns and corresponding functions
        pivotColGenerator - Column name generator
        Returns:
        SQL query that applies pivoting to the input query
